subject: Softball
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Colleges and Universities
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: A semitrailer truck crossed a median and collided with a bus carrying 15 players from the Lady Lions team at North Central Texas College on Friday, officials said.
snippet: A semitrailer truck crossed a median and collided with a bus carrying 15 players from the Lady Lions team at North Central Texas College on Friday, officials said.
